channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report I-2023080013

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO BELT, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023070468
item.description:
Report X-2023070468

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO FIVE PACKAGES THAT WERE COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY TEN POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING SPECIMENS. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO THE SAME CONSIGNEE ARE 1Z08E1671596587837, 1Z08E1671595372445, 1Z08E1671597618051 AND 1Z08E1671599424668. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2023070358
item.description:
Report X-2023070358

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-11
  • City: OGDEN
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLING SOUND OF AN AEROSOL CAN. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE X 12 OUNCE AEROSOL CAN OF FLAMMABLE TOUCH UP PAINT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED BY LANSING BUILDING PRODUCTS USING UPS ACCOUNT B348G4, THE UPS STORE #7225, 185 W 12TH ST D, OGDEN, UT 84404.
